title: Smasher

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
Each day, you *must* select another player to challenge them to Smash. At the beginning of the night that player will be informed they must download Super Smash Flash 2 and create an account to fight you in an online lobby, or they will be attacked by you.
You will fight in 3-stock matches.
If you beat your target twice, you win and attack your target. If they beat you thrice before you beat them twice, you will instead attack yourself and they get to live.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Survive to the end of the game.
